definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: It is in times of adversities that your true character and qualities are shown.
sentences.chinese: 四面楚歌之時，正是你顯露不凡氣概與特質的機會。

sentences.english: Manhood is changing. It’s as simple, and as complicated, as that.
sentences.chinese: 男子氣概，簡單如此，複雜如斯。

sentences.english: His heroism, his courage was extraordinary," Colin Blakemore, the chief executive of Britain's Medical Research Council said.
sentences.chinese: 他有着非凡的英雄氣概和勇氣。

sentences.english: People have slammed you for not having enough “ masculinity” in your skating.
sentences.chinese: 人們批評你在滑冰時太沒有男子氣概。

sentences.english: There are two men — two masculine, strong alpha males who reveal their tender side.
sentences.chinese: 兩個有男子氣概的大男人互相揭示對方脆弱的一面。

sentences.english: We were ignored by the Tommy Hilfiger-clad younger group until Marina raised the subject of "machismo".
sentences.chinese: 我們忽視了湯米希爾菲格和濱海提出的主題“氣概”。

sentences.english: It’s as if these young men have developed a warped idea of manhood.
sentences.chinese: 似乎這些年輕小夥子們對男子漢氣概有歪曲的理解。

sentences.english: The author analyzes why the Taiwanese labor union movement presents highly militant masculinity on two levels.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣工會運動所展現出來的是一種戰鬥性男子氣概。

sentences.english: He never learnt the manly and military virtues which his father prized.
sentences.chinese: 他從未學得他父親所看重的男子氣概和軍人品質。

sentences.english: Wine Maniac's heroic spirit soars with shine.
sentences.chinese: 酒癖的英雄氣概閃着光彩在翱翔。

sentences.english: He faced up to his difficulties manfully.
sentences.chinese: 他以男子漢的氣概勇敢地面對困難。

sentences.english: Wine Maniac's heroism soars with flare.
sentences.chinese: 酒癖的英雄氣概閃着光彩在翱翔。

sentences.english: Frank was very kind , manly , open-hearted .
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭克非常善良，有男子氣概，並且心胸坦蕩。

sentences.english: They withstood the tests with wonderful power and sublime heroism.
sentences.chinese: 他們憑着神奇的力量和大無畏的英雄氣概經受了考驗。

sentences.english: Shoulder width taper waist, seem to have the male the bearing more.
sentences.chinese: 肩寬窄腰，似乎更有男人氣概。

sentences.english: It was also true that I wanted to show off my new manliness.
sentences.chinese: 我想表現出全新的男子漢氣概，這也是真的。

definition: lit. able to support both heaven and earth/of indomitable spirit (idiom)
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
